user.title: Connect to Firefly Cloud
user.description: Enter your school's Firefly code to connect to your school's Firefly system.

auth.title: Authenticate with Firefly
auth.description:
Complete authentication by logging into Firefly:

1. [Click here to open Firefly]({auth_url}) (link opens in a new tab)
2. Log in with your Firefly credentials
3. After successful login, you should end up at a page with xml
4. Copy the entire response (should start with <token> and end with </token>)
5. Paste it in the field below

Device ID: {device_id}

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate with Firefly
reauth_confirm.description:
Your Firefly authentication has expired. Please log in again:

1. [Click here to open Firefly]({auth_url})
2. Log in with your Firefly credentials
3. After successful login, you should end up at a page with xml
4. Copy the entire response (should start with <token> and end with </token>)
5. Paste it in the field below

Device ID: {device_id}

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Firefly Cloud. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.school_not_found: School not found. Please check your school code and try again.
error.school_disabled: This school's Firefly Cloud integration is not enabled. Please contact your school administrator.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please ensure you copied the complete authentication response and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This Firefly Cloud school is already configured.
abort.already_in_progress: Configuration of this Firefly Cloud school is already in progress.
abort.reauth_successful: Reauthentication successful! Your Firefly Cloud integration is now working again.
